Name: Kakwitene VR
About the game: Use your VR hand controllers index trigger to fly around and touch the colored pollen spheres to hear how the color is pronounced with a Kanien’kéha dialect (Mohawk Language Dialect). You can sit in the flowers to relax and look around too. Pollen spheres are hidden in some of the flowers, you will hear them when you fly into them.
Meta Title: Kakwitene VR: Jun 4, 2019, Monica Peters and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kakwitene VR? Check out the release date (Jun 4, 2019), developer insights from Monica Peters, and a complete game summary.
